S

S7PlcConnection - Class in org.apache.plc4x.java.s7.connection
Class implementing the Connection handling for Siemens S7.
S7PlcConnection(InetAddress, int, int, String) - Constructor for class org.apache.plc4x.java.s7.connection.S7PlcConnection
 
S7PlcConnection(ChannelFactory, int, int, String) - Constructor for class org.apache.plc4x.java.s7.connection.S7PlcConnection
 
S7PlcDriver - Class in org.apache.plc4x.java.s7
Implementation of the S7 protocol, based on: - S7 Protocol - ISO Transport Protocol (Class 0) (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc905) - ISO on TCP (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1006) - TCP
